death.attack.overloaded_machine.player: %s was killed by an overloaded %s whilst trying to escape %s
powergrid.gui.current_meter.title: Measured current
powergrid.gui.heater.title: Coil temperature
powergrid.gui.voltage_meter.title: Measured voltage
powergrid.message.coil_exists: This terminal already has a coil connected to it
powergrid.message.coil_max_turns: Cannot put any more turns on this transformer
powergrid.message.coil_missing_items: You don't have enough items to wind this coil
powergrid.message.coil_same_terminal: Cannot create coil connected to a single terminal
powergrid.message.connection_failed: Failed to create a new connection
powergrid.message.connection_missing_ite: You don't have enough items to make this connection
powergrid.message.connection_no_path: No valid path found to this terminal
powergrid.message.connection_too_long: This terminal is too far away
powergrid.message.connection_two_wire_ty: Cannot connect wires of different types
powergrid.ponder.current_gauge.header: Monitoring Electricity using the Current Gauge
powergrid.ponder.current_gauge.text_1: The Current Gauge displays the current flowing through it's terminals
powergrid.ponder.current_gauge.text_2: Current gauges are in series with the circuit so they can have an effect on the transferred power
powergrid.ponder.current_gauge.text_3: When wearing Engineers' Goggles, the player can get more detailed information from the Gauge
powergrid.ponder.electric_motor.text_1: The electric motor lets you convert electricity into rotation
powergrid.ponder.electric_motor.text_2: The speed of the motor depends on the voltage you provide
powergrid.ponder.generator.text_1: When coils are facing a spinning rotor they start generating electricity
powergrid.ponder.generator.text_2: The generated voltage is directly proportional to the speed of the rotor
powergrid.ponder.generator.text_3: When you draw current from the coils, the rotor will slow down and its stress impact will increase
powergrid.ponder.generator.text_4: If you draw too much current your coils will start to overheat and explode!
powergrid.ponder.generator_coil.text_1: A generator coil alone can't do much
powergrid.ponder.generator_coil.text_2: By using the wrench you can add terminals to the coil
powergrid.ponder.generator_coil.text_3: Coils placed next to each other connect to form one large coil
powergrid.ponder.generator_coil.text_4: You can select between different aggregation types
powergrid.ponder.generator_coil.text_5: Coils connected in series sum their voltage but also their resistance
powergrid.ponder.generator_coil.text_6: Voltage of coils connected in parallel is limited by the smallest voltage out of all of the coils...
powergrid.ponder.generator_coil.text_7: ...but their resistance gets smaller when you add more coils
powergrid.ponder.generator_coil.text_8: You can have only one coil be the output of the whole aggregate
powergrid.ponder.generator_housing.text_: The generator housing can be used to aggregate all coils around the rotor
powergrid.ponder.generator_rotor.text_1: The generator rotor is a weakly coupled kinetic device that will try to spin up to the speed provided at its input
powergrid.ponder.generator_rotor.text_2: You can extend the rotor by placing more rotor blocks at the back
powergrid.ponder.generator_rotor.text_3: There can only ever be one input shaft
powergrid.ponder.growth_lamp.text_1: The growth lamp is a special type of light bulb which accelerates crop growth in a certain area when powered on
powergrid.ponder.heating_coil_basic.head: Warming up the atmosphere
powergrid.ponder.heating_coil_basic.text: The heating coil can be used to heat up the passing Air Flow if enough power is applied to it
By applying a bigger voltage the Air Flow can be used for bulk blasting
powergrid.ponder.heating_coil_speed.head: Electrified bulk processing
powergrid.ponder.heating_coil_speed.text: The heating coil allows for faster bulk processing
powergrid.ponder.light.header: Lighting up the world with electricity
powergrid.ponder.light.text_1: When light bulbs are inserted into fixtures and powered on they turn electricity into light
powergrid.ponder.light.text_2: If the voltage is not high enough, the light bulb will be dimmer
powergrid.ponder.transformer_sizes.text_: Transformers come in different sizes, each of them offering different power capabilities and winding capacities
powergrid.ponder.transformer_winding.tex: To wind a transformer, first select the starting terminal for your winding
Next, click on the transformer body and pick the number of turn you want to add
Lastly, select the end terminal for your winding
Your transformer will now transform voltage with the ratio you wound
powergrid.ponder.voltage_gauge.header: Monitoring Electricity using the Voltage Gauge
powergrid.ponder.voltage_gauge.text_1: The Voltage Gauge displays the voltage potential between it's terminals
powergrid.ponder.voltage_gauge.text_2: When wearing Engineers' Goggles, the player can get more detailed information from the Gauge
powergrid.ponder.wire_connector.text_1: Wire connectors can be used as attachment points for wires
powergrid.ponder.wire_simple.text_1: Wires are used to transfer electricity between terminals of electric devices
powergrid.ponder.wire_voltage_drop.text_: Every wire has a resistance, the longer the wire, the more resistance it has
This causes a voltage drop to occur when current is flowing
Lost power is turned into heat
If too much power is drawn, the wires can overheat and break
